summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 17th Avenue Northeast and 16th Avenue Northwest, each from East 65th Street to East 75th Street; East 65th Street, East 68th Street, East 70th Street and East 75th Street, each from 15th Avenue Northeast to 17th Avenue Northwest; and East 73rd Street from 17th Avenue Northeast to a point 100 feet west of 16th Avenue Northeast; all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 1996 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
